summary: "Good Kid, M.A.A.D City" is Kendrick Lamar's second album, released in 2012. It tells a story about growing up in Compton, dealing with drugs and gangs. The album features big names like Drake and Dr. Dre and was very popular, reaching number two on the U.S. charts. It got lots of awards and was super successful, even being named one of the greatest albums of all time. Lamar's lyrics and the album's theme made it a big hit.
title: Good Kid, M.A.A.D City
